subject: General Science
topic: Amal, Kshar aur Namak (Acids, Bases & Salts)
question_en: What is the chemical formula for table salt?
question_hi: टेबल सफेद की कार्यालय मार्गदर्शनल संदर्भ है।
explanation_en: Sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) is the example of a salt. It is a neutral compound and does not fit into acidic or basic categories.
explanation_hi: नाथना (Na2SO4) एस्टोन की तेलचना की मार्गदर्शनल
explanation_en: Acids are substances that donate hydrogen ions (H+) when dissolved in water. Sodium chloride (NaCl) is an example of an acidic salt.
explanation_hi: एक पदार्थ होने की तेलचना की मार्गदर्शन
explanation_en: Bases are substances that accept hydrogen ions (H+) when dissolved in water. Sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) is an example of a basic salt.
Salts are compounds formed when an acid combines with a base. Sodium hydrogen carbonate (NaHCO3) is an example of a neutral salt.
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Acids are substances that release hydrogen ions (H+) when dissolved in water. Sodium hydroxide (NaOH) is an example of an acidic salt.
explanation_hi: एक एक्सीड प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Bases are substances that react with acids to form salts. Sodium hydroxide (NaOH) and citric acid (C6H8O7) are an example of basic and acidic salts respectively.
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Acids and bases combine to form salts. Sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) and sodium carbonate (Na2CO3) are examples of acidic and basic salts respectively.
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Acids and bases can also be classified as strong or weak. Sulfuric acid (H2SO4) and sodium bisulfate (NaHSO4) are examples of strong acidic and weak acidic salts respectively.
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Sodium chloride (NaCl) and sodium carbonate (Na2CO3) are examples of neutral salts
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) and sodium nitrate (NaNO3) are examples of acidic salts
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत पदार्थ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Sodium carbonate (Na2CO3) and sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) are examples of basic salts
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड और प्रावत प्रावत पदारथ के निर्माण
explanation_en: Sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) aur sodium phosphate (Na3PO4) aur shakti na karein
explanation_hi: एक एक्सिड औरथ करथ के निरथ निराण
